@dev Claim vested tokens and transfer them to their holder. Note that
 this function has to be called by the grant holder themselves.

claimableTokens

nodes.documentation: @return The address of the vested token
nodes.name: token

nodes.documentation: @return The total amount of tokens currently vested
nodes.name: totalVesting

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculate amount of vested tokens at a given time for a given grant.
 Note that this function does not take into account any previously claimed
 tokens - it is the responsibility of the caller function to ensure that
 the grant holder does not claim the same value multiple times.
 @param grant Grant The vesting grant
 @param time uint256 The time to be checked
 @return An uint256 representing the amount of claimable tokens
     *   |                         ____________ total value
  |                       _/
  |                     _/
  |                   _/
  |                 _/
  |                /
  |              .|
  |            .  |
  |          .    |
  |        .      |
  |      .        |
  |    .          |
  +===+===========+---------+----------> time
    Start       Cliff      End
nodes.name: _calculateClaimableTokens

@dev Calculate amount of vested tokens at a given time for a given grant.
 Note that this function does not take into account any previously claimed

 @param grant Grant The vesting grant

     *   |                         ____________ total value
  |                       _/

  |              .|
  |            .  |
  |          .    |
  |        .      |

  +===+===========+---------+----------> time
    Start       Cliff      End
nodes.name: _calculateClaimableTokens

devdoc.details: Lends very heavily from SirinLab and Stox's own VestingTrustee contracts.

claimTokens().details: Claim vested tokens and transfer them to their holder. Note that this function has to be called by the grant holder themselves.

claimableTokens(address,uint256).details: Calculate the total amount of tokens that a holder can claim at a given time, from the total amount vested for this holder. This function does the precheck of making sure that there is actually a grant for this owner, before delegating to the private _calculateClaimableTokens() function to derive the claimable amount at the given time.

params.holder: address The address of the holder

claimableTokens(address,uint256).return: a uint256 representing a holder's total amount of vested tokens

constructor.details: Constructor. Initializes the ERC20 token linked to the grants.

params.token: IERC20 The address of the previously deployed ERC20 smart contract

createGrant(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Grant tokens to a specified address.

params.cliff: uint256 The date at which the cliff occurs in seconds since the Unix Epoch
params.end: uint256 The end of the vesting period in seconds since the Unix Epoch
params.revokable: bool Whether the grant is revokable or not
params.start: uint256 The start of the vesting period in seconds since the Unix Epoch
params.to: address The address to grant tokens to
params.value: uint256 The amount of tokens to be granted

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

revokeGrant(address).details: Revoke the grant of tokens of a specifed address and returns tokens to the grant contract owner.

params.holder: address The address which will have its grant revoked.

token().return: The address of the vested token

totalVesting().return: The total amount of tokens currently vested

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: VestingTrustee

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
